name: Trapped Mother
description: Mother rabbit and her new-born baby were trapped in an unsealed box, they could have escaped the box just by jumping out of it, however, Mother rabbit is suffering from a bad mood because she has not yet adapted to being a mother and therefore unable to complete the ordinary tasks as usual. The food and water supply in the box is only enough for them to live for 5 days. You can try to help them out by clicking the mouse non-stoppingly.
